alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 9:06PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pueblo County through 930 PM MDT... At 906 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pueblo Reservoir, or near Pueblo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pueblo around 920 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pueblo West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
